content: Head left from the pavilion, and you'll find one such large crowned Buddha statue between two columns that you can interact with and pray to.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Precept Corridor'.
The content is as follows:
Head left from the pavilion, and you'll find one such large crowned Buddha statue between two columns that you can interact with and pray to.
